actions.committee: Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Trade Act of 1978 to require the Secretary of Agriculture to use the export enhancement program to encourage the commercial sale of United States wheat in world markets at competitive prices whenever the importation of Canadian wheat into the United States reaches certain triggers.
short_title: Export Enhancement Program Trigger Act of 2000

summary.text: Export Enhancement Program Trigger Act of 2000 - Amends the Agricultural Trade Act of 1978 to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to use the export enhancement program to: (1) encourage the world market sale of U.S. wheat whenever Canadian wheat imports into the United States reach specified levels; and (2) use such program in response to specified pricing practices by foreign state trading enterprises which adversely affect U.S. agricultural exports.

titles.title: Export Enhancement Program Trigger Act of 2000

A bill to amend the Agricultural Trade Act of 1978 to require the Secretary of Agriculture to use the export enhancement program to encourage the commercial sale of United States wheat in world markets at competitive prices whenever the importation of Canadian wheat into the United States reaches certain triggers.
